did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letter from Women's Trade Union League (London, England) to trade unionists throughout England on behalf of the Women Chain Makers at Cradley Heath.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Letter from Women's Trade Union League (London, England) to trade unionists throughout England on behalf of the Women Chain Makers at Cradley Heath regarding a lock-out, dated August 27, 1910.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Women's Trade Union League of London, England

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Women's Trade Union League Letter #5151m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
